summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of phones with features designed to meet customer needs. Benefits of upgrading to the product phone include access to the latest technology and features, as well as customer support and exclusive discounts on select products. Prices for the phones range from $399 to $799, and there are often discounts and promotions available when upgrading. Additionally, customers do not need to purchase any additional items or services in order to upgrade their phone. Contoso Wireless provides 24/7 customer service for all their products, including online and telephone support as well as a dedicated team of technicians.
